properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas Vineyard and Nantucket
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 29 at 4:03PM EST until January 30 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters extending out to 25 nm South of Marthas
Vineyard and Nantucket.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THURSDAY
